mapper.insert: insert into msg (sender, receiver, msg_content, write_type) values(#{sender},#{receiver},#{msgContent},'N')
insert into msg (sender, receiver, msg_content, write_type) values(#{sender},'admin',#{msgContent},#{writeType})
mapper.select: select * from msg where receiver=#{receiver} and write_type='N' order by msg_no desc
select * from msg where sender=#{sender} and write_type='N' order by msg_no desc
select * from msg where receiver=#{admin} and write_type!='N' order by msg_no desc
